TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Grante----- (KSP.exe has stopped working)

I wish I knew what the above statement means

Bees. It means bees. You are bees. The universe is bees.

Bees.

Bees.

I wish for a little less bees.

Bees.

Granted. Less bees are the most dangerous type of bee. Little less bees mean that they can enter your throat more easily.

I wish there were no less bees.

BEES.

Bees.

Granted. You have honey on your face, and the bees have spotted you.

I wish for the next person to be stuffed in a space suit that has poison ivy leaves in it, and then thrown into space.

Granted. I copy a survival from Survive The Attack.

I wish I was transferred to an extraterrestrial fast food restaurant.

Granted, the food runs away faster than you can.

I wish I worked at Kerbal Space Center.

The MCP grants your wish but after your shift you are to report to the light cycle arena.

I wish for excessive ear hair.

Granted, then BEES

BEEEEEESSSSSS!

Bzzz.

Bees!

Granted. You receive a video file of bees. Also bees are extinct.

I wish for eternal despair of the Bee Cult at the grave of every single bee in existence.

Granted. Bees go extinct out of shock from this situation, and since bees are now extinct, the bees' stockpile of bees releases the bees, triggering a bee infestation that kills every bee in existence, which repeats over and over again until the paradox causes Jebediah Kerman to crash a plane, which causes him to be put to shame, which causes bees to come back, which causes you to get stung three times, thereby causing you to hate bees forever.

I wish that I could control time.

Granted: you are given a TARTIS that you have no idea how to control. good luck tumbling through space and time.

I wish that I could understand more then half the stuff posted on the last 15 pages.

Granted! You receive all knowledge in the known universe and die from the overload.

I wish for a newspaper.

Granted. A newspaper delivery boy crashes into you with his motor scooter.

I wish for today to go by faster.

Granted. At the end of today, the world is destroyed by bees. You just sped up the world's bee destruction.

I wish that I knew the V0tGil word for "bee".

NuySup bee... or perhaps I just insulted you. Not sure which.

I wish for clairvoyance.

You see the beepocalypse coming

I wish for an FTL drive

Granted. Due to Mr. Aristotle, inventor of the FTL drive, laozers from your eyes. Also, your eyes are on fire from the pure shock of using an FTL drive.

I wish bees beed.

Edited April 23, 2014 by Tery215
corrrection
Granted, but the bees were eating you from the inside out

The Granting Fairy is disappointed with you.

I wish for a tuna sandwich.

Granted. The tuna is one molecule of tuna, Leaving you with a mayo sandvich.

I wish to survive that attack!

Granted. You also suffer from extreme pain for the rest of your life (& when you're dead).

I wish for a bee sandwich.

Granted, but the bee joke was never funny.

I wish I understood why so many people are going out of their way to derail the thread with bees.
